summary: Consume Jira Software API to perform various operations like creating, updating, and deleting issues, comments, users, and more.

parameters.name: jira version
parameters.description: Select the version of Jira (Cloud, Server, or Server Pat) to connect to.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with in Jira (Issue, Issue Attachment, Issue Comment, User, or Custom API Call).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource (Changelog, Create, Delete, Get, Get Many, Notify, Status, Update, or Custom API Call).

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Select the project to perform the operation on. Can be selected from a list or by ID.

parameters.name: issue type
parameters.description: Select the type of issue to perform the operation on. Can be selected from a list.
